fields.name: Data gathering
fields.description: The implementation phase of your experiment where you gather data.

fields.name: Data filtering & cleaning
fields.description: Cleaning and filtering the data to prepare it for analysis

fields.name: Data schema
fields.description: Define a data schema based on cleaning and filtering which improves reproducibility.

fields.name: Publication phase
fields.description: Prepare your work for publication online or in the workbench

fields.name: Find and reuse
fields.description: Find and reuse existing code that might be useful in the future and/or for others
